HEADER.DESCRIPTION: Wondering about your choice of studies? You're in the right place! Our app was created to make this important step in your life easier. By answering a few simple questions, we'll help you navigate the available options and find a course and university that best meet your expectations and passions. Begin your educational journey with us and discover which studies are ideal for you. We wish you fruitful searching!

LABEL.REGION: In which region of Poland would you like to study?
LABEL.UNIVERSITY_TYPE: What type of university do you prefer?
